game.title: The Lost Sword
game.description: In a land of magic and mystery, an ancient sword known as the 'Blade of Shadows' has been lost. It is said to possess incredible power, capable of bringing either great prosperity or unspeakable destruction to the world. The High King has tasked you, a skilled adventurer, with the quest to find this lost sword and bring it back to the kingdom.
game.reward: A chest of gold coins and the chance to wield the Blade of Shadows

tasks.description: Begin your journey by gathering information about the lost sword. Speak to local villagers, wise sages, and knowledgeable wizards who may have heard rumors or legends about the Blade of Shadows.
According to the legends, an ancient map that holds the secret to the sword's location exists. Travel to the treacherous Whispering Woods and find the hidden shrine that guards the fabled map.

tasks.objective: Navigate through the Cave of Shadows
tasks.description: The rumors speak of a treacherous cave filled with deadly traps and dangerous creatures. Enter the Cave of Shadows and navigate its labyrinthine paths to uncover the next clue about the sword's whereabouts.

The final challenge awaits you: the Guardian of Darkness. This powerful entity guards the entrance to the hidden chamber where the Blade of Shadows lies. Engage in a fierce battle and emerge victorious to claim the sword.
